titles.title: He Made Streams In The Desert

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He made streams in the desert,
A way in the wilderness,
The waters He parted
And there was dry land,
He made streams in the desert,
A way in the wilderness
Because I held to His hand.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There were times I know it
My feet were nigh slipping,
And only by grace did I stand;
And the load I carried,
I knelt down below it
But I did not let go of His hand.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And the tempter, untiring,
Drew grand conclusions
Of what a poor fool I am;
And through waves of worry
And clouds of confusion
Still I did not let go of His hand.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And so, my brethren,
Commit to His keeping
Your lives for Him to plan;
For though trials be grievous
There's no shame in weeping,
Just don't let go of His hand.
